schema-validation.schema_prompt_template: You are a D&D 3.5e content generator. Provide a JSON schema that strictly describes the structure of {content_type} objects influenced by {context}, including required fields: 'name' (string), 'description' (string), and any other necessary attributes. The schema must be strictly valid JSON Schema (draft-07 or later) with a single top-level object.

options_tooltips.min_level: Minimum level of the party or challenge.
options_tooltips.max_level: Maximum level of the party or challenge.
options_tooltips.regen_name_only: If checked, regeneration only changes the name, preserving other attributes.
options_tooltips.lock_name: If checked, the name is locked and will not change on regeneration.
